name: Trash Night
description:
Created for STL ScatterJam 2016

Play as the rare, vulnerable to trash Wolfworm! Separated from your family on a night of trash, you make your way home as the monsters of detritus and debris come to harm you! Can you survive the full attack of the Cans? Avoid their trash for as long as you can and escape the terrifying bite of the Garbocan!

Be safe! Run home! And most importantly, don't litter!

Use WASD on your keyboard to move. Dodge the falling trash objects or be eaten!

Credits:

Bre, Bryan, Jason, Joey, Mae, TJ, William
